entry.title: Day Two Dry Shampoo - Light Hair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Dry Shampoo
Price: 18.00

The day two dry shampoo is the solution to greasy, dull, oily limp hair. With a blend of organic clay powders and essential oils to lift and boost volume, the dry shampoo will bring your locks back to life. 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Treated hair safe
  • 8oz Paper Recyclable Bottle

How to use

Simply sprinkle a little on the roots and massage into the hair to boost volume and reduce grease.

Ingredients

Maranta arundinacea (arrowroot) root powder, kaolin (white clay), theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, vanilla planifolia oil.

entry.title: Dandruff & Dry Scalp Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Conditioner
Price: 18.00

Zinc Pyrithione and Aloe Vera Dandruff & Dry Scalp Conditioner gently cleans and moisturizes your scalp, while removing dandruff flakes and preventing irritation. Enriched with natural extracts such as Chamomile Extract, Aloe Vera, Vitamin B5, and Rooibos Tea Leaf. It will leave your hair and scalp feeling soft and healthy. The conditioner has a rich creamy texture.

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Treated hair safe
  • 8oz BPA Free Recyclable Bottle

How to use

Apply to wet hair, massage in well for at least a minute, then rinse out with warm water. Repeat if required. 

Ingredients

Water (aqua), decyl glucoside, cocamidopropyl betaine (derived from coconut oil), sodium c14-16 olefin sulfonate, panthenol (vitamin b5), glycerin (vegetable), salicylic acid, aspalathus linearis (african rooibos) leaf extract*, butyrospermum parkii (african shea butter) fruit nut extract*, pygeum (prunus africanum) bark extract*, capsicum frutescens (african cayenne) fruit extract*, quillaja (african saponaria soap) bark extract*, salix alba (willow) bark extract*, camellia oleifera (green tea) leaf extract*, ginkgo biloba (ginkgo) leaf extract*, rosemarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, equisetum hiremale (horsetail) plant extract*, urtica dioca (nettle) root extract, salvia officinalis (sage) leaf extract*, symphytum officinalis (comfrey) root extract*, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, trigonella foenum graecum (fenugreek) seed extract*, citrus grandis (grapefruit seed) extract*, glucose & glucose

entry.title: Psoriasis & Itchy Scalp Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Conditioner
Price: 18.00

Tea Tree & Neem Oil Psoriasis & Itchy Scalp Conditioner helps soothe the flaking and itchy scalp that can be associated with psoriasis.  It helps to maintain a healthy looking scalp.

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Treated hair safe
  • 8oz BPA Free Recyclable Bottle

How to use

Apply to wet hair, massage in well for at least a minute, then rinse out with warm water. Repeat if required. 

Ingredients

Water (aqua), stearyl alcohol, cetrimonium chloride, cetyl alcohol, cetearyl alcohol, isopropyl myristate, dimethicone, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil, azadirachta indica (neem oil) leaf, panthenol (vitamin b5), glycerin (vegetable), polysorbate 80, parfum (herbal), aspalathus linearis (african rooibos) leafextract*, butyrospermum parkll (african shea butter) fruit nut extract*, pygeum (prunus africanum) bark extract*, capsicum frutescens (african cayenne) fruit extract*, quillaja (african saponaria soap) bark extract*, matricaria recutita (chamomile) flower extract*, camillia oleifera (green tea) leaf extract*, ginkgo biloba (ginkgo) leaf extract*, rosemarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, salvia officinalis (sage) leaf extract*, symphytum officinalis (comfrey) root extract*, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, trigonella foenum graecum (fenugreek) seed extract*, citrus grandis (grapefruit seed) extract*, glucose & glucose oxidase & lactoperoxidase (natural preservative), potassium sorbate (food preservative), *certified organic

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Shampoo
Price: 18.00

Tea Tree and Neem Oil Psoriasis & Itchy Scalp Shampoo helps soothe the flaking and itchy scalp that can be associated with psoriasis.  It helps to maintain a healthy looking scalp.

How to use

entry.title: Thin & Fine Weak Hair Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Shampoo
Price: 15.00

Thin Fine Hair Shampoo is enriched with Panthenol and Biotin to thicken each strand of hair, making your hair fuller and healthier looking.  Wheat protein restores moisture balance, elasticity & shine. Your hair will have more body and strength instantly.

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free
  • Treated hair safe
  • 8oz BPA Free Recyclable Bottle

How to use

Apply shampoo to wet hair, massage in well for at least a minute, then rinse out with warm water. Repeat if required. Apply conditioner and leave that on for a couple of minutes. Then rinse off and finish with COOL water.

Ingredients

Water (aqua), decyl glucoside, cocamidopropyl betaine (derived from coconut oil), sodium c14-16 olefin sulfonate, panthenol (vitamin b5), glycerin (vegetable), polysorbate 80, parfum (herbal), aspalathus linearis (african rooibos) leaf extract*, butyrospermum parkll (african shea butter) fruit nut extract*, pygeum (prunus africanum) bark extract*, capsicum frutescens (african cayenne) fruit extract*, quillaja (african saponaria soap) bark extract*, salix alba (willow) bark extract*, ginkgo biloba (ginkgo) leaf extract*, equisetum hiremale (horsetail) plant extract*, urtica dioca (nettle) root extract, salvia officinalis (sage) leaf extract*, symphytum officinalis (comfrey) root extract*, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, trigonella foenum graecum (fenugreek) seed extract*, citrus grandis (grapefruit seed) extract*, glucose & glucose oxidase & lactoperoxidase (natural preservative), potassium sorbate (food preservative), *certified organic

entry.title: Natural Hand Cleansing Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 6.00

This natural and chemical-free alternative to hand cleanser is infused with organic chamomile, aloe vera, with Vitamin B5 to prevent drying leaving your hands moisturized and germ-free. 

Features + Benefits

  • Hand Sanitizer
  • One pump is sufficient for full coverage.
  • Made with 99% Isopropyl Alcohol with a concentration (65% V/V)
  • 2oz Airless Pump

Ingredients

Alcohol denat (99% Isopropyl Alcohol), aqua, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, cocamidopropyl betaine, glycerine, melaleuca alternifolia, citrus sinensis, dl-panthenol, xanthan Gum, lecithin, sclerotium gum, pullulan. Scented contains Sweet Orange and Grapefruit essential Oil.

entry.title: Cuticle Therapy Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Cuticle Oil
Price: 11.00

Cuticle therapy oil quicky and easily moisturizes cuticles that are essential for nail health. Soften and strengthen your nails with our luxurious oil. Oils like rosehip, jojoba, and argan will quickly penetrate the nail bed to make nails shiny and healthy. 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten Free
  • GMO Free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty Free
  • BPA FREE Twist Pen

How to use 

Twist bottom of brush cap until a drop of oil dampens the bristles. Rub bristles all over the nail bed. Massage as necessary

Ingredients

Rosa canina fruit oil, camellia sinensis leaf oil, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil,   butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, , argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil,  tocopherol (vitamin e), citrus sinensis (sweet orange) oil, citrus limonum (lemon) oil, citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, citrus paradisi (white grape fruit) oil, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, mentha spicata (spearmint) oil.

entry.title: Glacial Gel Overnight Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Glacial Gel Overnight Mask
Price: 25.00

Soothing and cooling cucumber extract, sweet rose and aloe very juice cool and hydrate skin while sleeping. Blue spirulina repairs and fights free radicals that can cause aging. This is a supercharged vitamin mask to fight inflammation and damage from the sun and provide lost moisture. Use as a cooling after-sun treatment or overnight while sleeping. 

Use as a hydration treatment while flying or traveling long distances in a vehicle.

100% Natural | 100% Organic | Tested on Friends Not Animals | 60ml Glass  Recyclable Jar

Benefits

  • Repairs and restores hydration and moisture.
  • Perfect for dry, extremely dry, combination, sensitive, oily, rosacea and red skin types.
  • Great for anti aging.

How to use

The gel can be used in two ways. 

Use as a treatment for 20 min after cleansing and toning your skin. 

Use as an overnight treatment after cleansing and toning your skin. 

Apply a generous amount all over the face. After the product is absorbed completely, leave treatment overnight, and rinse off in the morning. This mask can be used daily one to two times per week. Follow with a skipped morning routine and just apply your favourite moisturizer

Ingredients

Purified water, cucumis sativus (cucumber) distillate, rosa damascena (rose) distillate, aloe barbadensis juice, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, squalane, propanediol, spirulina, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate.

entry.title: Makeup Brush Cleaner Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Makeup Brush Cleaner Shampoo
Price: 13.00 - 22.00 (2 variants)

Did you know your makeup brushes harbor more than a dozen different bacteria like Staphylococcus, Streptococcus, and E-coli?  But don't throw them away!!

When you use our solid makeup brush cleaner shampoo, that is gentle for even the most luxurious brushes, you will not be transferring that bacteria to your skin. 

The brush cleaner will thoroughly clean, washing away any dirt and bacteria and the added benefits of argan and apricot oil will condition your brushes, making them feel brand new. The jar is large enough to clean large brushes. Completely safe for natural and synthetic brushes. Avoid getting the ferrule wet. Travel size is perfect for your travel makeup bag. 

How to use

Wet brushes thoroughly, moisten the container with warm water. Lather the brush and swirl, rinse and repeat until the water runs clear. Reshape the bristles and then lay brushes on a flat dry towel.  

Ingredients

A proprietary blend of oils. It contains coconut oil, apricot kernel oil, and argan oil. Patent Pending.* 

Product Information

  • Vegan , Gluten Free, GMO Free, Cruelty Free
  • Shelf life 12 months
